data.title: Dimerco Express Group
data.meta_description: Dimerco provides global logistics services including air freight, sea freight services and contract logistics services.
data.text:
Global Shipping Through Asia-Pac, and Beyond

Dimerco connects Asia with the world like no other global 3PL.

Quick Track

Get Quote

MyDimerco

Enter Tracking Numbers

Dimerco Reference #s: Air - DIM+9#, Ocean - DFS+9#

Trusted by Thousands of Global Brands

Dimerco Solutions

Transportation. Warehousing. Customs & Compliance. One strategic partner for all your global logistics needs. Learn More

The Logistics of China Plus One

A primer on the freight, regulatory and cultural issues that must be considered when diversifying production beyond China to other Asian countries

Key Industries

We serve a range of industries, with deep experience shipping time-critical, high-value goods for technology manufacturers.

Aerospace

We help aerospace companies ship parts and oversized freight worldwide, including AOG support.

Consumer Electronics

We support inbound and outbound distribution of electronics components and finished goods.

Semiconductor

We help some of the world’s largest semiconductor companies streamline their supply chains.

Medical Devices

We manage safe, secure logistics for high-value medical equipment, devices and testing kits.

Fashion & Lifestyle

We manage complex fashion supply chains, from raw materials through to final distribution.

What Makes Dimerco Different?

China, India, and ASEAN Logistics Specialists

300+ global logistics offices, with 130+ owned offices concentrated across Asia.

Consistency and Reliability

Secure, cloud-based operating system standard across all services and offices.

Global Electronics Supply Chain Experts

Strong focus on time-critical, high-value air freight shipments.

Flexible and Agile

We combine strong freight buying power with a responsive, dedicated combat team for VIP service.

Digital Logistics Focus

Data-driven solutions enable supply chain collaboration, efficiency and full visibility.

Stable Partner

Long-term, strategic partner with a 50-year heritage. Publicly listed on the Taipei Exchange.

Start a Discussion

Tell us your global logistics challenge and we can recommend a solution that meets your objectives – at the right price.

For immediate attention contact a local office.
